name: CosmosDbEmulator
description: Create and start an Azure Cosmos DB Emulator container for testing
author: Microsoft
instanceNameFormat: Run Azure Cosmos DB Emulator container

inputs.name: containerName
inputs.label: Container Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Assign a unique name to the container

inputs.name: enableAPI
inputs.label: API
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the API enpoint for the Azure Cosmos Emulator

inputs.name: portMapping
inputs.label: Port mapping
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a list of *`<host-port>`* **`:`** *`<container-port>`* mappings or **`PublishAll`** to automatically map container ports to host ports in the ephemeral port range

inputs.name: hostDirectory
inputs.label: Host Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to a directory for saving diagnostics and PFX and CER forms of the Emulator's self-signed SSL certificate

inputs.name: consistency
inputs.label: Consistency Level
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the default consistency level (default: Session)

inputs.name: partitionCount
inputs.label: Number of 10GB data partitions to allocate
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the total number of 10GB partitions to allocate for storing data up to 200 (default: 25)

inputs.name: defaultPartitionCount
inputs.label: Number of 10GB partitions to reserve per partitioned collection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the number of 10GB partitions to reserve for each partitioned collection up to 200

OutputVariables.name: ContainerId
OutputVariables.description: Full ID of the Emulator container

OutputVariables.name: Endpoint
OutputVariables.description: Web address for communicating with the Emulator in the container

OutputVariables.name: HostDirectory
OutputVariables.description: Path to the directory containing diagnostics and PFX and CER forms of the Emulator's self-signed SSL certificate

OutputVariables.name: IPAddress
OutputVariables.description: IPv4 address assigned to the container

OutputVariables.name: Ports
OutputVariables.description: Publish port mapping as a JSON object of the form: `{ "8081": <gateway-port>, "8901": <compute-port-1>, "8902": <compute-port-2>, "10250": <mongo-port-1>, "10251": <direct-port-1>, "10252": <direct-port-2>, "10253": <direct-port-3>, "10254": <direct-port-4>, "10255": <mongo-port-2>, "10256": <mongo-port-3>, "10350": <cassandra-port>`}
